description: Retrieves a specific voice available for speech synthesis.

parameters.name: voice
parameters.description: The voice for which information is to be returned. Retrieve available voices with the `GET /v1/voices` method.

parameters.name: customization_id
parameters.description: The GUID of a custom voice model for which information is to be returned. You must make the request with service credentials created for the instance of the service that owns the custom model. Omit the parameter to see information about the specified voice with no customization.
